languages.text: "Суды мон-кай так фальшивы... Темные кузены хотя бы честны в своих амбициях и не дают ложного чувства, что обвиняемый может спастись".
languages.translation_comment: Finished the showdown with the prefect at the Palace of Justice.

traits.locale_text: "Суды мон-кай так фальшивы... Темные кузены хотя бы честны в своих амбициях и не дают ложного чувства, что обвиняемый может спастись".

languages.text: "Mon-keigh trials are so full of delusion... At least my dark cousins are open in their ambitions and do not offer a false impression that the accused might walk free."
languages.translation_comment: Finished the showdown with the prefect at the Palace of Justice.
languages.original_text: "Суды мон-кай так фальшивы... Темные кузены хотя бы честны в своих амбициях и не дают ложного чувства, что обвиняемый может спастись".

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh trials are so full of delusion... At least my dark cousins are open in their ambitions and do not offer a false impression that the accused might walk free."

"Mon-keigh trials are so full of delusion... At least my dark cousins are open in their ambitions and do not offer a false impression that the accused might walk free."

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイどもの裁きは、まったく欺瞞ばかりだな…少なくとも私の闇の同胞たちは、野心を隠さず、被告が自由の身になれるなどという幻想を与えたりはしない」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh trials are so full of delusion... At least my dark cousins are open in their ambitions and do not offer a false impression that the accused might walk free."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイどもの裁きは、まったく欺瞞ばかりだな…少なくとも私の闇の同胞たちは、野心を隠さず、被告が自由の身になれるなどという幻想を与えたりはしない」

languages.text: "Die Prozesse der Chem-Pan-Sey sind so voller Täuschung ... Meine dunklen Vettern stehen zumindest offen zu ihren Ambitionen und täuschen nicht vor, dass der Angeklagte vielleicht davonkommt."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh trials are so full of delusion... At least my dark cousins are open in their ambitions and do not offer a false impression that the accused might walk free."

traits.locale_text: "Die Prozesse der Chem-Pan-Sey sind so voller Täuschung ... Meine dunklen Vettern stehen zumindest offen zu ihren Ambitionen und täuschen nicht vor, dass der Angeklagte vielleicht davonkommt."

languages.text: « Les procès des mon-keigh sont empreints de faux-semblants... Au moins, mes ténébreux cousins affichent ouvertement leurs intentions au lieu de donner l'impression que l'accusé a une chance de regagner sa liberté. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh trials are so full of delusion... At least my dark cousins are open in their ambitions and do not offer a false impression that the accused might walk free."

traits.locale_text: « Les procès des mon-keigh sont empreints de faux-semblants... Au moins, mes ténébreux cousins affichent ouvertement leurs intentions au lieu de donner l'impression que l'accusé a une chance de regagner sa liberté. »

languages.text: «Los juicios de los mon-keigh son una falacia... Por lo menos mis siniestros parientes manifiestan abiertamente sus ambiciones y no dan a los acusados la falsa impresión de que podrían quedar libres».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh trials are so full of delusion... At least my dark cousins are open in their ambitions and do not offer a false impression that the accused might walk free."

traits.locale_text: «Los juicios de los mon-keigh son una falacia... Por lo menos mis siniestros parientes manifiestan abiertamente sus ambiciones y no dan a los acusados la falsa impresión de que podrían quedar libres».

languages.text: “猴子的审判真是充满了欺骗……至少，我那些邪恶的表亲从不掩饰他们的恶毒，他们从不会让受审者误以为自己可以无罪释放。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh trials are so full of delusion... At least my dark cousins are open in their ambitions and do not offer a false impression that the accused might walk free."

traits.locale_text: “猴子的审判真是充满了欺骗……至少，我那些邪恶的表亲从不掩饰他们的恶毒，他们从不会让受审者误以为自己可以无罪释放。”

languages.text: "Mon-keigh duruşmaları resmen maskaralık. Benim kara soydaşlarımın bile ne istedikleri bellidir. Sanıkların elini kolunu sallayarak gezebileceklerini ima dahi etmeyiz."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh trials are so full of delusion... At least my dark cousins are open in their ambitions and do not offer a false impression that the accused might walk free."
